text:
Candidates belonging to Scheduled Castes may apply online for financial assistance schemes of TamilNadu Adi Dravidar Housing & Development Corporation (TAHDCO) for 2015-16.

According to a release from District Collector A.Gnanasekaran TAHDCO provides loans, financial assistances to SC candidates. Assistances will be provided to women to buy agricultural lands and men and women to develop agricultural lands, self employment ventures, to set up clinics, optical shops, physiotherapy centres, diagnostic centres, pharmacy. Women, men, transgender and differently abled self help groups would be given revolving fund. MD’s discretionary fund is given to widows, differently abled, orphaned children, impoverished artists, transgenders on priority basis. Aspirants of Civil Service exams and group-I of TNPSC, those who pursue courses of CA and Cost Accountant may also get assistance.

Interested people may visit: application.tahdco.com.
title: SC candidates may apply online for financial assistance
